Ben was at a party with his friends. Ben wanted to welcome his new friend, Lily, to the party. The big mirror in the hall was clean and shiny. A balloon pops in the other room. Ben hears the balloon pop.
column2: The big mirror in the hall.

column1: Pete was in the park playing on the monkey bars. Pete wanted to climb to the highest bar. The monkey bar was very strong. A bird lands on Pete's nose. Pete feels the bird landing on his nose.
